title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1500.21 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1500.21 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

It is of utmost importance to members of
the Bar and to the public that attorneys maintain their professional competence
by continuing their legal education throughout the period of their active
practice of law. This program establishes the minimum requirements for
continuing legal education for attorneys other than newly admitted attorneys in

New York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1500.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
